options.label: Planning a new solar + battery install

blocks.title: What's your main purpose for battery storage?
Estimated daily energy usage?
Do you prefer lithium-ion or lead-acid batteries?
Do you want a wall-mounted or floor-standing battery system?
Will the system be installed indoors or outdoors?
Desired storage capacity (if known)?
Should the system provide backup during grid outages?
Do you want remote app monitoring for battery status?
Do you already have a compatible inverter?
Would you like the installer to supply all equipment?
Timeframe for installation?

services.promptTemplate: Draft a battery storage project brief. Current setup: {{battery_setup}}. Purpose: {{battery_purpose}}. Energy usage: {{battery_usage}}. Preferred battery type: {{battery_type}}. Mounting style: {{battery_mounting}}. Installation location: {{battery_location}}. Desired capacity: {{battery_capacity}}. Backup capability: {{battery_backup}}. Monitoring: {{battery_monitoring}}. Existing inverter: {{battery_inverter}}. Supply scope: {{battery_supply}}. Timeline: {{battery_timing}}.

services.label: EV Charging Stations
services.description: Electric vehicle charger installation for homes and businesses

blocks.title: What type of EV charger do you need?
How many chargers are required?
Do you have single-phase or three-phase power?
Preferred charger speed?
Do you want a tethered cable or socket-only charger?
Will the charger be installed indoors or outdoors?
Is there an existing dedicated circuit or breaker?
Do you want smart charging features (app control, scheduling)?
Do you want to integrate with solar or battery storage?
Is the property owned or rented?
Do you need help applying for rebates or grants (if available)?
When would you like installation completed?

services.promptTemplate: Create an EV charger installation brief. Charger type: {{ev_charger_type}} with quantity {{ev_charger_quantity}}. Power supply: {{ev_power_supply}}. Desired speed: {{ev_speed}}. Cable preference: {{ev_tethered}}. Location: {{ev_location}}. Existing circuit: {{ev_dedicated_circuit}}. Smart features: {{ev_smart_features}}. Solar/battery integration: {{ev_solar_integration}}. Property ownership: {{ev_property_ownership}}. Rebate assistance: {{ev_rebates}}. Timeline: {{ev_timeline}}.

services.label: Smart Metering & Monitoring
services.description: Energy monitoring systems for solar, consumption, and automation

blocks.title: What type of system do you want to monitor?
What's your goal for installing smart monitoring?
Is there already a smart meter or monitoring device installed?
Do you prefer real-time mobile app access?
What kind of data would you like to see?
Do you want alerts for high usage or system faults?
Is your Wi-Fi or network signal strong where the system will be installed?
Do you want integration with smart home automation?
Preferred display type?
Who will supply the monitoring hardware?
Do you require ongoing data reporting or maintenance?
Timeframe for installation?

services.promptTemplate: Summarize smart monitoring requirements. Systems monitored: {{monitoring_system}}. Goals: {{monitoring_goal}}. Existing setup: {{monitoring_existing}}. Real-time access: {{monitoring_real_time}}. Data preferences: {{monitoring_data}}. Alerts: {{monitoring_alerts}}. Network strength: {{monitoring_network}}. Automation integration: {{monitoring_automation}}. Display type: {{monitoring_display}}. Hardware supplier: {{monitoring_supplier}}. Maintenance: {{monitoring_maintenance}}. Timeline: {{monitoring_timing}}.

services.label: Data, Networking & Communications
services.description: Professional network infrastructure including Cat6, fiber, Wi-Fi, and CCTV

blocks.title: Which services do you need?
Type of property or site?
How many rooms or areas require coverage?
Is there existing cabling or network infrastructure?
Key performance goals?
Do you need the installer to supply networking hardware?
Any challenging installation environments?
Project timeline?
Do you need ongoing network management or support?

services.promptTemplate: Create a networking and communications project brief. Services required: {{data_project_scope}}. Property type: {{data_property_type}} with {{data_scope_size}} areas. Existing infrastructure: {{data_existing_infrastructure}}. Performance goals: {{data_performance_goal}}. Equipment supply: {{data_equipment_supply}}. Installation challenges: {{data_install_environment}}. Timeline: {{data_timeline}}. Ongoing support: {{data_support}}.
